- Exterior: Brick veneer on a slab foundation; white vinyl windows; metal screen door; small concrete porch landing.

- Entry stairs: Brick steps with a concrete landing; visible edge wear/chipping; potential trip hazard.

- Driveway: Concrete driveway with longitudinal cracks and surface spalling; patching appears uneven.

- Grading/moisture: Soil/grading appears to slope toward the right side of the foundation; limited clearance at brick/base; potential moisture intrusion risk.

- Obstructions: Large black trash bin stored against wall near right window; relocate to improve access and clearance.
